definitions.definition: A path between two points that is faster than the commonly used paths.
A method to accomplish something that omits one or more steps .
A file that points to the location of another file and serves as a quick way to access it.
examples: There are shortcuts to some of my favourite applications on my desktop.
labels: in the Microsoft family of operating systems
definitions.label_groups: computing , in the Microsoft family of operating systems

main_definition: A path between two points that is faster than the commonly used paths.
secondary_definitions: A method to accomplish something that omits one or more steps .
( computing , in the Microsoft family of operating systems ) A file that points to the location of another file and serves as a quick way to access it.
